document.full_text: from its spartan new york city studios, a non-profit organization called new tang dynasty television is trying to change china with a tiny budget, a volunteer staff and a mission to inform a censored nation.
document.title: tv channel trying to change china from new york
lines_and_colors: from its spartan new york city studios, a non-profit organization called new tang dynasty television is trying to change china with a tiny budget, a volunteer staff and a mission to inform a censored nation.
